articles.title: Elon Musk's X fined €120m over 'deceptive' blue ticks - BBC
articles.description: The European Commission says the social media site is opening its users up to scams and impersonations.
articles.content:
Elon Musk's social media platform X has been fined 120m (£105m) by the EU over its blue tick badges - despite US warnings about doing so.
The European Commission said by allowing people to pay for a… [+3163 chars]

articles.author: Kristina Killgrove
articles.title: Volcanic eruption triggered 'butterfly effect' that led to the Black Death, researchers find - Live Science
articles.description: A volcanic eruption in 1345 may have kicked off a series of events that led to the Black Death sweeping through medieval Europe.
articles.content:
An unknown volcanic eruption in the mid-14th century may have set the stage for the spread of the Black Death
 in Europe, according to a new study. By triggering a cool and overcast period in the Me… [+4597 chars]
